info.name: SnappyMail
info.author: SnappyMail, RainLoop Team, Nextgen-Networks, Tab Fitts, Nathan Kinkade, Pierre-Alain Bandinelli
info.description:
**Simple, modern, lightweight & fast web-based email client.**
- **Dark mode** - **Responsive design** - **Full Sieve filtering support** - **Almost all IMAP features** including advanced searching - **Integration with Nextcloud Unified Search** - **Integration with other Nextcloud apps** (Contacts & Files) - **Multiple mail accounts and identities** - **Send & receive OpenPGP encrypted/signed emails** (With full HTML support, ECC keys, or plain text with Mailvelope) - **Many security features** (Sodium encrypted passwords, Sec-Fetch, TOTP 2FA, DKIM, etc.) - **Kolab integrations**
After enabling in Nextcloud, go to Nextcloud admin panel, "Additionnal settings" and you will see a "SnappyMail webmail" section. There, click on the link to go to the SnappyMail admin panel.
